title: F1's bid to return to Africa boosted by Kyalami Grade 1 upgrade approval
summary: Over the next three years, Kyalami will be upgraded to Grade 1 standards, making it eligible to host a Formula 1 race

qa_pairs.question: What is the significance of a circuit achieving Grade 1 status in Formula 1?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: It means the circuit meets the highest safety and technical standards required to host F1 races.
wrong_options: It indicates the circuit has hosted multiple F1 races in the past.
It means the circuit has a minimum number of grandstands.
It signifies the circuit has a permanent paddock facility.
